title: Can’t see my FPS
body: Basically the title. I used to be able to see how much FPS I had in the upper right corner and now I can’t

replies.body:
CTRL + F

If you want to change it you can do so in your keybinding settings in the client or game, it's under the bindings Display section.
Tiny Twitch on point today! By default, CTRL+F will turn on or off the FPS display, but you may need to check what it is currently if that command doesn't work.
